SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

curam.util.ctm.bom.annotation
Annotation Type BOTraits

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=java.lang.annotation.ElementType.TYPE)
public @interface BOTraits

Annotation that is used to capture properties exposed by a business object type. Note that since the properties of a business object type are identified through this annotation, only static properties are applicable and supported. This means that once a property is defined for a business object type with suitable value, its value cannot be changed during run-time.

Currently, the following static properties are identified and supported,

  • Mode of Deletion

A business object type after identifying its static properties can use this annotation to represent them and can provide information to the infrastructure by defining this annotation on the respective InformationalBOM implementation. The desired business functionality that is applicable based on the properties exposed by a business object type will be decided by the infrastructure.

For example, if CodeTable business object type wishes to indicate to the framework that it supports Hard Deletion of its business objects, then its respective InformationalBOM implementation must carry this annotation on its class declaration. 

 
 
 
 @BOTraits(deletionMode = DeletionMode.PHYSICAL)
 public class CodeTableInformationalBOM implements InformationalBOM {
 }

Each property in this annotation is expected to have a sensible default value. This means that, even if an Informational BOM implementation for a business object type doesn't have defined this annotation in its class declaration, then the infrastructure will take the default values for various annotation properties and will process them accordingly.

Optional Element Summary
 DeletionMode deletionMode
           Indicates the mode of deletion supported by a business object type to the infrastructure.
 

deletionMode

public abstract DeletionMode deletionMode

Indicates the mode of deletion supported by a business object type to the infrastructure. The value of this property will assist the infrastructure in determining whether partial revert is applicable or not on a revert change set.

Refer DeletionMode for more details.

Returns:
The mode of deletion that is supported by a business object type.
Default:
curam.util.ctm.bom.businessobjectinformation.DeletionMode.LOGICAL
